definition: constituting the full quantity or extent, uncastrated adult male horse
details:
adjective
- constituting the full quantity or extent
= synonyms: total, full
- constituting the undiminished entirety
= synonyms: integral, intact
- (used of domestic animals) sexually competent
= example: (used of domestic animals) sexually competent
= synonyms: intact
- (of leaves or petals) having a smooth edge
noun
- uncastrated adult male horse
= synonyms: stallion
